title: GetHired
description: A Recruitment web application. ASP.NET Core web api and PostgreSQL database are being run with Docker Compose and used JWT Auth. It contains two different React clients for backoffice and user.

title: HomeworkTrackApp
description: A Learning Management System (LMS). I developed backend side in this project. I used ASP.NET Core web api based on Monolithic Layered Architecture and PostgreSQL database. Entire system run on Docker and used JWT Auth.

title: BreastCancerPredictor
description: A web application to predict breast cancer (benign-malignant) with using AI (machine learning) SVC Model. Entire system run on Docker Compose and used JWT Auth.
